backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for schools, teachers, trainings, reviews, and blog posts with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor data to the new schema by adding structured location fields to schools.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test cases with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark mode color tokens and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script tag loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, global layout, theming, and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin access gate component handling Internet Identity login, logout, and gating admin dashboard content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Provides the admin dashboard with tab navigation for schools, teachers, trainings, and reviews sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/R: Displays and manages reviews, including listing, school lookup, and deletion with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/S: Handles creation, editing, listing, and deletion of schools with form dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/T: Manages teacher records, including listing, creation with school assignment, and deletion.
Manages training programs with creation, validation of hours, listing, and deletion features.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyLinkB: Renders a button that copies a given URL to the clipboard with success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/directory/Direct: Provides static informational sections explaining how the directory works and why to use it.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Displays a school card with image, location, training badges, teacher count, and a button linking to the school details page.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Renders a list of teachers with avatars and specializations, or a placeholder if none exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Provides the site footer with about text, navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the main header with logo, navigation (desktop and mobile), and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Shows an about section for a school, generating default text when no description is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Exports default FAQ items containing common questions and answers about yoga teacher training.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Displays an FAQ accordion with expandable questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Presents an image gallery with a modal viewer for enlarged images.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolInq: Implements an inquiry form with validation, submission simulation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Displays a Google Maps embed and link for a school’s location, or a fallback message if no location is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolPro: Renders a large banner with the school’s name, location, background image, and optional inquire button.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Fetches and displays school reviews, shows average ratings, and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Lists a school’s training programs with hours, estimated duration, descriptions, and actions to view curricula or inquire.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Extracts a YouTube video ID and embeds the school’s video or shows a fallback message if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Fetches and displays similar schools, showing loading skeletons or a fallback message when appropriate.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminReviews: Provides admin hooks to fetch all school reviews and a placeholder mutation for deleting reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSchools: Provides admin hooks to list, create, update, and delete schools with backend error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTeacher: Provides queries and mutations for admins to list, create, and delete teachers across all schools.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTrainin: Implements admin-level fetching, creation, and deletion of trainings aggregated from all schools.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Fetches all blog posts or a single post using the backend actor with error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches teachers and trainings for a given school to populate lightweight school cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Loads full school details including teachers and trainings with combined loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Retrieves reviews for a school and provides a mutation to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Returns schools filtered by selected training hours, fetching trainings when needed.
Queries schools by country, state, and city with backend error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Computes similar schools by comparing training hours, returning top matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Fetches school and training data using react-query and combines loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Provides a helper to log structured error details for failed backend calls.
frontend/src/lib/blogContent.ts: Utilities for generating excerpts, splitting content into paragraphs, and selecting display excerpts.
frontend/src/lib/locationFormat.ts: Formats structured location data into readable strings and checks for structured fields.
frontend/src/lib/locationRoutes.ts: Builds location-based URL paths, encodes/decodes segments, and generates breadcrumbs.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Selects deterministic thumbnail images for schools based on a simple hash of the ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page with mission, features, and informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard behind an authentication gate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with loading, error, and empty states, showing excerpts and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with loading/error states and renders content paragraphs.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with placeholder contact info cards and a non-functional message form.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a yoga school directory with banner, filters, and scrollable search results using selected training-hour filters.
frontend/src/pages/LocationListingPage.t: Shows yoga schools filtered by decoded country/state/city route params with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays detailed school info including banner, about section, courses, teachers, media, map, reviews, and inquiry form.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Provides informational cards about submitting or claiming a school listing, with future-implementation placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: React page that loads and displays a yoga training curriculum with loading/error states, school info, and curriculum details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support, including hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings with plugins included.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the yoga directory app’s features, issues, and architectural notes.
